welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Montmorency, the charming city known for its picturesque streets, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a variety of international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals and serving a mix of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but users must register with an email address to access it.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration or have time limits.
